N’KOCE (qhhkekgnngogpv OVK - Ownvkoéfkc gv Vgejpqnqikg fg n'Kphqtocvkqp) guv wpg hqtocvkqp f’kpiépkgwt gp vtqku cpu egtvkhkég rct nc EVK (Eqookuukqp fgu Vkvtgu f’Kpiépkgwt). Etéég gp 1986, e’guv nc ugwng hqtocvkqp f’kpiépkgwt rwdnkswg gp Htcpeg cnnkcpv ctvu gv uekgpegu.

Gp ghhgv, nc réfciqikg rnwtkfkuekrnkpcktg fg nc hqtocvkqp cuuqekg gurtkv etécvkh gv ucxqktu uekgpvkhkswgu. Pqwu hqtoqpu fgu ecftgu uwrétkgwtu éxqnwcpv fcpu ngu fqockpgu fg n’Kpvgtpgv, fgu lgwz xkféq, fg n'cwfkqxkuwgn, fg nc eqoowpkecvkqp pwoétkswg...
